DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the technical benefits, advantages and limits of the use of the Harmonic Focus curved shears in total thyroidectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial on Harmonic Focus Shears
DOC.detailed_description: According to a randomized sequence, total thyroidectomy was performed in 34 patients using Harmonic Focus and in 34 patients using clamp-and-tie technique. In this randomized prospective trial, differences in the duration of surgery, intraoperative bleeding and post-operative complications were analysed.
DOC.criteria: Total thyroidectomy for multinodular goiter in adults patients Redo surgery, malignancy.
